candanikā：f．（汙水）溝池溝坑（usually，but not necessarily dirty）．
Candanikā，【陰】池塘（a pool at the entrance of a village （usually，but not necessarily dirty））。candanikāya，池塘。

Candanikā，（f．） a pool at the entrance of a village （usually，but not necessarily dirty：see Vin．II，122 & cp．candanapaṅka Av．Ś I．221，see also PW sub candana<sup>2</sup>） S．V，361; M．I，11，73，448; A．I，161; Th．1，567; J．V，15; Miln．220; Vism．264，343，359; Sdhp．132．（Page 262）
candanikā：A dirty pool at the entrance of a village
CANDANIKĀ：[f] hàm chứa phân，chỗ ô uế
candanikā：hồ nước để tắm rữa，tỳ khưu có thể xây bờ đá và làm thềm chung quanh

candanikā：စန္ဒနိကာ （ဣ）
တံစီးတွင်း။ တံစီးအိုင်။ မစင်ကြယ်သော ညွန်စီးအိုင်။ ပျဥ်အခင်း။
